test_scenarios.name: Expand folder tree
test_scenarios.description: Test expanding folders in the folder tree dropdown by clicking the expand/collapse node
steps_performed: Navigated to Assets > My Website
Clicked on 'Home' dropdown to open folder tree
Clicked expand node for 'Groups' folder
Verified child folder '9' became visible
Confirmed Results count increased from 9 to 10
test_scenarios.notes: Expand functionality works correctly. Child folders are revealed when parent is expanded.

test_scenarios.name: Collapse folder tree
test_scenarios.description: Test collapsing folders in the folder tree dropdown
steps_performed: With Groups folder expanded, clicked the same expand node again
Verified child folder '9' was hidden
Confirmed Results count decreased from 10 back to 9
test_scenarios.notes: Collapse functionality works correctly. Child folders are hidden when parent is collapsed.

test_scenarios.name: Navigate using breadcrumbs
test_scenarios.description: Test navigation using the breadcrumb trail at the top of the Assets panel
steps_performed: Clicked 'Images' folder in the tree dropdown to navigate into it
Verified breadcrumb showed 'HOME > IMAGES'
Clicked 'HOME' in the breadcrumb to navigate back to root
Verified navigation returned to root folder
test_scenarios.notes: Breadcrumb navigation works correctly in both directions.

test_scenarios.name: Get folder descendants (deep navigation)
test_scenarios.description: Test navigating into nested folders to view descendants
steps_performed: Navigated from Home to Images folder
Navigated from Images to Publisher subfolder
Verified breadcrumb showed 'HOME > IMAGES > PUBLISHER'
Confirmed folder contents displayed correctly at 3 levels deep
test_scenarios.notes: Multi-level deep navigation works correctly up to at least 3 levels.

test_scenarios.name: Get folder ancestors (back navigation)
test_scenarios.description: Test navigating back up the folder hierarchy using breadcrumbs
steps_performed: From Publisher folder (3 levels deep), clicked 'IMAGES' in breadcrumb
Verified navigation went up one level to Images folder
Confirmed breadcrumb updated to 'HOME > IMAGES'
test_scenarios.notes: Ancestor navigation via breadcrumbs works correctly.

test_scenarios.name: Sort folder tree
test_scenarios.description: Verify folder tree displays folders in sorted order
steps_performed: Opened folder tree dropdown from Home
Verified folders are displayed in alphabetical order
Confirmed order: Badges, Groups, Images, PermissionsTestFolder, Templates, ThisIsAVeryLongFolderN..., Users, WorkflowTestFolder
test_scenarios.notes: Folder tree displays folders in alphabetical (A-Z) order. Sort is controlled via API sortOrder parameter.

test_scenarios.name: Deep folder hierarchies
test_scenarios.description: Test expanding folders with many nested subfolders
steps_performed: Expanded Users folder in the folder tree
Verified 16+ numeric subfolders visible (003-019)
Confirmed Results count increased to 25
Verified each subfolder has its own expand capability
test_scenarios.notes: Folder tree handles deep hierarchies with many subfolders correctly.

test_scenarios.name: Folder tree permissions
test_scenarios.description: Verify folder permissions are indicated in the folder tree/grid view
steps_performed: Navigated to PermissionsTestFolder - successfully accessed (empty folder)
Navigated to Images folder
Observed SecureFolderTest2026 displays lock icon indicating secure/restricted permissions
Confirmed permission indicators are visible on folder cards
test_scenarios.notes: Folder permissions are visually indicated with lock icon on secure folders. SuperUser can access all folders.

key_api_methods: GetFolderDescendants - Gets folder children for tree expansion
GetFolders - Gets the folder tree structure
GetTreePathForFolder - Gets ancestors for breadcrumb navigation
GetFolderPath - Gets breadcrumb path for a folder
